description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，規定學生必須利用暑假至車輛相關機構實習，參與校外合作車廠所提供之訓練 ， 觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative vehicle engineering company during summer vocation , practice and learn the real operation of the auto shop or vehicle engineering related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: １.數系：數位系統所使用之各種數系及其轉換之方法２.布氏代數：了解布氏代數的基本運算法和定律，及認識基本邏輯 及邏輯閘３.	布氏代數之簡化：介紹各種布氏代數之簡化方法４.組合邏輯：布氏代數及邏輯閘，計分析各種組合邏輯電路５.可程式邏輯陣列：介紹ＰＬＡ，ＰＡＬ，ＦＰＧＡ等之設計方法６.正反器：介紹各種正反器電路及了解其基特性７.同步與非同步序向邏輯電路：介紹各種同步與非同步序向電路分析與設計之方法 ８.遞迴網路：介紹遞迴網路之設計方法
description.en: １.Number systems and codes ２.	Boolean algebra ３.	Simplification of Boolean algebra ４.Combinational logic ５.	Programmable logic arrays ６.Flip-flops and their conversions７.Synchronous and asynchronous sequential circuits ８.Recursive networks

description.zh: 本課程主要提供學生在生物化學上幾個選擇性主題較深的知識。包括:蛋白質結構和功能、蛋白質輸送、蛋白質分解、接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: This course provides students with a depth of knowledge of a number of selected topics in biochemistry. It Including of protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; bioenergetics including photosynthesis; metabolic and genetic regulation;; biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。力系的平衡、摩擦、面積與質量慣性矩、結構分析、虛功法。
description.en: Equivalent Systems of Forces, Static Equilibrium ,Area And Mass Moments of Inertia, Analysis of Structures, Methods of Virtual Work.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。依所欠專長及發展專題需要選項實習，每學期以兩項為原則，項次含：1.機工實習：車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工等。2.鑄鍛實習：鑄造或鍛造等。3.焊接實習：鈑金及氣焊、電弧焊實習。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorContents: (1) Machining Shop5          (2) Casting or Forging Shop          (3) Welding ShopStudents, depending on their own specialties and interests, shall choose at least two categories in one semester.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意第一部份（電工原理）：電路元件、直流電阻電路、直流電容電路、電磁感應、直流電感   電路、直流電機、交流電路、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、同步電動機、電工儀表設備。第二部分（電工實驗）：三用電表量測、電磁開關啟動法、電動機之順序控制、RC電路之量測、感應電動機之Ｙ－△降壓啟動法、直流馬達與直流發電機、、繞線式感應馬達、直流伺服馬達速度及位置控制、變頻器與感應馬達速度控制。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorPart I (Electrical Engineering Principles):Circuit components, DC resistance circuit, DC capacitor circuit, Electro-magnet induction, DC inductor circuit, DC electric machines, AC circuit, Transformers, Three-phase AC, Three-phase induction motors, Single-phase induction motors, Synchronous motors, Electrical instrument and meters.Part II (Electrical Engineering Lab.):Multi-meter measurement, Magnetic switch starting, Sequential control of motor, Measurement of RC circuit, Ｙ-△ Starting of induction motor, DC Motor and DC generator, Wound induction motor, Speed and position control of DC servo motor, Inverter and speed control of induction motor.

name.en: Introduction to Mechanical and Electrical Engineering

description.zh: 介紹機電工程所涵蓋的基礎知識及技術範圍，包括機械、電機、製造、能源、冷凍空調及車輛工程等領域以及未來的展望。藉由多位教師聯合授課，以課堂講授、實驗示範、參觀工廠、影片教學及分組報告的方式，幫助學生了解機電工程之基礎原理與概念。
description.en: Introduce the engineering technology covered by Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Manufacturing Technology, Energy Engineering, Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Engineering and Vehicle Engineering and its future outlook. In order to help students understand the basics and concepts of mechanical and electrical engineering, we provide class lecture, experimental demonstration, plant tour, movie display, and group report.

notes: 由林啟瑞,蔡尤溪,黃緒哲三位系主任共同授課

description.zh: 1.作業系統簡介 2.網際網路 3.文書處理軟體使用 4.資料表格化與整理 5.簡報製作 6.網頁製作 7.數字系統與二進碼 8.數位邏輯簡介 9.計算機組織與架構 10.資料結構
description.en: To provide an overview of current computer technologies. Students will learn basic introductions to computer operating systems, internet software, office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc), WWW homepage programming, number system, logic gate, processor structure, and data structure.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 廣義的法律包括憲法、法律、命令等。作為國家最高規範的憲法，其核心價值在於維護人性尊嚴；其所要保障的基本權（自由權、平等權、生存權、財產權、工作權……）、受益權、參政權、人格權等，均有賴相關法律的實踐方能落實。本課程主要在探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: Laws, if broadly defined, include constitutions, legal rules and orders. The Constitution--as the supreme norm of a country-have as its essence the preservation of human dignities. All the basic rights protected by the Constitution (such as the rights to freedom, equality, survival, properties and the possession of a job), the right to be benefited, the right to participate in politics and the right of humanity cannot be fully realized without the help of laws. This course focuses the discussions on constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
description.en: The course is designed for chemical engineering major. The topics explore chemistry at a greater depth and with more emphasis on concepts, problems, and calculations. Topics include significant figures, thermochemistry, gases, quantum theory and the electronic structure of atoms, periodic relationships, chemical bonding, chemical reaction, oxidation-reduction reaction, chemical kinetics, chemical equilibrium, acids and bases, changes of states, synthetic polymer materials, electrochemistry.

description.zh: 配合化學課程之進展，教導學生學習各項基本實驗操作及儀器設備之技巧，進行各項實驗課程，如COD 的測定，氮莫耳體積之測定，錯合物之生成，氧化還原滴定，蒸汽壓，測量溶解度，反應速率，化學平衡，耐綸-6,6之製備以訓練學生養成手腦並用的務實科學素養。
description.en: Following the progress of the course of chemistry, introduce chemical engineering students to learn basically operations and techniques for several kinds of devices. Scheduling laboratory experiments include the determination of COD, the determination of molar nitrogen volume, the synthesis of complex, the determination of redox titration, vapor pressure, the determination the solubility, rates of chemical reactions, chemical equilibrium, and the preparation of Nylon-6, 6. This course is designed to train students how to use their brain and hands simultaneously and to settle down their science concepts.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 本科目旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路10.人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques

description.zh: 本課程在介紹電資（電機、電子、資訊及光電）領域之課程及基本知識與技術。課程內容包含: 1. 邀請產、官、學、研界人士，對電機與資訊科學相關議題作演講； 2. 論文研讀及報告 3. 電機、電子、資訊及光電等電資領域課程簡介； 4. 電資領域之基本知識與技術介紹與研討。
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques about the area of electrical engineering and information technologies (electrical engineering, electronic engineering, computer science and information engineering, and electro-optical engineering). The outline of this course includes: 1. to invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in electrical engineering and information technologies, 2. to read and present technical papers, 3. to introduce the course structures of the area of electrical engineering and information technologies, 4. to study the basic concepts and techniques about the area of electrical engineering and information technologies.

description.zh: 本課程以計算機硬體及軟體之基本介紹為始，逐步引入程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以C語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入C++程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練及其在資訊工程上之應用，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計專業之基礎。
description.en: To familiarize the student with basic computer programming concepts. Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem statements, designing computer solutions, as well as an introduction into the syntax and semantics of the C and C++ programming language. An important objective of the course is to present effective methods of program design using modular construction and structured programming notions of sequence, selection, and iteration structures.

notes: 第9節在電算中心412教室上課

description.zh: 以傳授設計原理、平面及立體設計觀念、美的形式原理、平面及立體的構成練習、對各種材料特性的應用經驗以及造形與色彩的研究達到設計感覺的養成並提高計畫性創造能力，是發展實用性及機能性以前之設計訓練的基礎。
description.en: This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of two-dimension and three-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane, volume, and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied.

description.zh: 藝術與新意的遇合，一切就從分享開始!不論黑白彩色、平面立體、抽象具象、靜態動感，藝術一向變化多端，不論抒發情感、宣揚宗教、服務政治或是傳達思想，藝術從來不缺理由，別說你不懂藝術!因為在二十一世紀裡，藝術已不僅是貴婦們的權力，身為未來設計師與建築師的您們，應該積極讓藝術存在於你生活的週遭，不論分享美感經驗、探討觀點流派、解析藝術風格、從事文化創意設計，亦或是批判現今藝術社群，你都擁有發聲的權力。而此系列講座中的十場演講，都是在不同藝術領域中，從事創作多年的佼佼者，透過大師講座的平台，讓大師們進入校園，與全校師生一同分享這藝術與新意的無限饗宴。
description.en: When art meets innovation, everything starts from sharing!No matter art is black or white, flat or three-dimensional, abstract or concrete, motionless or active, it has always been protean. When art is used to express feelings, advocate religions, propagandizing politics, or transmitting thoughts, it never needs any reason. Don't say that you don't know what art is! In the 21st century, art is no longer the privilege of wealthy ladies. But you all, the future designers and architects, should work harder to make yourself inseparable with art. When you are sharing your own experience about esthetics, exploring different art sects, analyzing art styles, engaging in cultural creative design, or criticizing the contemporary art sects, you have the right to speak up. The ten speeches in this series will be delivered by many experts from different fields. It would be our honor to have them in the campus and share their fruition of art with all of the staff and students.

description.zh: 理論：1.素描概念2.形體與空間表達3.風格介紹技法：1.嘗試多元媒體表現2.練習心緒表達3.物體摹寫創作與鑑賞：1.素描的風格與表達2.素描創作參訪與觀摩
description.en: Theories：1.Concepts of sketch2.Expressions of structure and space3.Introduction of stylesTechniques：1.Try expressing of multiple2.Practice expressing from the state of mind3.Sketch some objectsCreation and Appreciation：1.Styles and expressions of sketch2.Sketch creationVisit to art museum

description.zh: 透過設計專題的演練，發展學生整體的設計研究分析和創新設計專業能力。以設計研究為基礎，針對學生個別興趣專長選定專題，進行深入研究發展，完整演練新產品開發之過程，以期培養工業設計之專業。
description.en: This course aims to a thesis project within the practices areas of industrial design, chosen by the student in consultation with the program instructors. Projects are orientated towards specific interests that each student has developed. Each student will finalize their portfolio and aim at being of professional quality and range during the year.

description.zh: 講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD 繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 以手繪與數位平行並進，訓練學生三維思考、設計與表達呈現的能力。
description.en: Introduce both freehand and computational techniques in visual representation. Develop abilities in 3D thinking and comunication.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts. Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對目前之軟體來調查並學習如何在三度空間表現、模擬、動畫、掃瞄及虛擬實境的運用。
description.en: The utilization of computer-aided visualization techniques through the use and investigation of commercially available software for photo-realistic rendering, lighting simulation, animation, scanning, raster graphics and virtual reality.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 由一般生活所接觸的事務引導同學去了解"建築"是什麼，並引導同學去觀察、去接觸、去想像。另一方面，由建築的構成元素、空間之虛實、規劃之分析、造型之介紹（建築與多種自然學科和人文社會學科的廣泛關係）以及尺度、比例之掌握，加上色彩、聲光、材料等等一系列分析與介紹，使同學了解構成建築之元素，對"建築"有更深一層的認識與愛好。
description.en: This course gives a brief tauch with those technologies related buildings and construction, that student may appreciate the architecture from a technical viewpoint.

description.zh: 闡述造形基本觀念、形式原理、形態心理、色彩基本觀念以及２Ｄ與３Ｄ構成原理、材質與視覺形態構成、光線及陰影效果與動態造形等理論。
description.en: Lecture on theory of visual organization of design elements and analysis of their abstract relationships. Principles of order, construction and pattern are studied including the influences of texture, color, light, and shade.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 候補
description.en: 候補

description.zh: 介紹光纖構造及光在光纖內的特性參數，包括模態偏極態等；介紹光纖系統的光源、偵測器等主動元件，及藕合器、連接器等被動元件；介紹光纖網路及光纖元件，包括分波多工器等的原理；介紹調變、放大、雜訊等光纖控制、偵測子系統。課程內容包括：1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖特性參數介紹 3.光在光纖內的傳播 4.光纖模態 5.光源6.光偵測器 7.藕合器、連接器 8.光纖元件-分波多工器 9.調變 10.雜訊與偵測。
description.en: 1 Introduction to the optical fiber system,  2 Parameters of the optical fiber,  3 Propagation of light inside optical fiber,  4 Modes of optical fiber,  5 Optical sources for optical fiber system,  6 Detectors for the optical fiber system,  7 Couplers and connectors  8 Introduction to DWDM,  9 Modulation,  10 Noise and Detection.

description.zh: 此課程為量子力學之簡介。在課程中，我們試圖從原子物理、分子物理及固態物理等各領域來說明、瞭解量子力學的重要性。在所舉之例中，我們只強調量子的現象，對量子力學本身之數並未特別做仔細、深入的計算。由量子力學所得的結果都與古典理論所得的結果做比較，以培養學生對量子的直覺。本課程的目的不只是處理數學式子與相關現象，同時也希望引領學生能進一步的運用在其專業領域。
description.en: This course is an introduction to formal quantum mechanics. It is to provide illustrations of quantum mechanics by taking many examples from different fields such as atomic physics, molecular physics and solid state physics. In these examples we concentrate on the quantum mechanical aspect of phenomena, often neglecting specific details. Whenever possible, the quantum mechanical results are compared with the classical ones in order to help the students develop his intuition concerning quantum mechanical effects. The intent, however is to treat in the course not only the basic formalism and related phenomena, but to take the student a step further to a consideration of generic and important application.

description.zh: (1)簡介 (2)光的偏振 (3)異向介質中的光波傳播特性 (4)Jones矩陣法 (5)液晶顯示器(6)液晶顯示器特性 (7)液晶空間光調制器 (8)液晶顯示器應用
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Polarization representation (3) Optical wave in Anistropic media (4) Jones Matrix Method (5) Liquid crystal displays (6) Properties of liquid crystal display (7) Liquid Crystal Spatial Light Modulators (8) Applications

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   真空工程, 直流電源, 射頻電源, 微波, 熱燈絲等各種能量方式之CVD化學氣相沉積法, PVD物理氣相沉積法, 電鍍技術,以及膜的特性觀察與實驗，包括SEM，EDX，XRD與金相顯微觀察，附著力測試等。1.光電半導體V-I特性分析試驗 2.接面型光電元件C-V量測實驗 3.光導電及少數載體存活時間量測實驗 4.邁克蓀干涉儀實驗(3)5.雷射繞射實驗(3) 6.偏振實驗(3)7.分光儀實驗(3)
description.en: The practices in vacuum engineering, variety deposition methods such as CVD, PVD and electroplating, that include DC, RF, microwave hot filament etc are be performed. Tests of film properties and its characterizations such as SEM, EDX, XRD, and metallurgical microscope are also be examined.1.Experiment on V-I characteristics of photonic devices.2.C-V measurements of optoelectronic devices.3.Measurements of photoconductivity and minority-carrier lifetime of photonic materials.4.Lab on Michelson interferometer5.Lab Experiment on diffraction 6.Lab on polarization7.Lab on spectrometer

description.zh: (1)雷射基本概念 (2)電磁場與物質交互作用 (3)物質能階結構 (4)光在介質中的傳播 (5)光學共振腔 (6)泵浦過程 (7)穩態雷射性質 (8)瞬態雷射性質(含Q-開關及鎖模等) (9)雷射系統(氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10)雷射的應用(1)雷射基本概念 (2)電磁場與物質交互作用 (3)物質能階結構 (4)光在介質中的傳播 (5)光學共振腔 (6)泵浦過程 (7)穩態雷射性質 (8)瞬態雷射性質(含Q-開關及鎖模等) (9)雷射系統(氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10)雷射的應用
description.en: (1)Introductory concepts (2)Interaction of radiation with matters (3)Energy levels in materials (4)Propagation of light through media (5)Optical resonators (6)Pumping processes (7)Continuous wave laser behavior (8)Transient laser behavior (9)Various lasers (10)Laser applications

description.zh: 1.幾何光學2.波動光學3.光束光學4.傅氏光學5.光電磁學6.偏極光學與晶體光學
description.en: 1. Ray Optics2. Wave Optics3. Beam Optics4. Fourier Optics5. Electromagnetic Optics6. Polarization and Crystal Optics

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1.簡介 2.光學尺 3.干涉儀 4.幾何誤差 5.幾何光學尺 6.雷射光學尺 7.雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 由環境保護的觀點來了解化學工業及其他產業之污染源，並且教授資源回收、減廢技術、進而設計清潔生產製程，以達到廢棄物資源化與管理的最終目
description.en: This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and This course introduces the waste sources from chemical and other industries. And the course will cover the techniques for waste recycle and reduction. Furthermore, the final goal is to design a cleaner technology process for achieving the waste minimization and waste management.

description.zh: 本課程將探討醫學工程在骨科醫學上應用之基礎原理、臨床操作以及未來的發展。包含的內容有:骨科醫學的基礎知識工程技術在骨科手術上之應用、骨科器械之種類及原理、骨科生醫材料之種類及特性、骨科生物力學、骨組織工程、軟骨再生、生物摩擦潤滑學等。
description.en: This course will introduce the applications of biomedical engineering techniques on orthopaedics. The topics of the course includes 1) Fundamentals of orthopaedics ; 2)Applications of engineering techniques on orthopaedics; 3) Principles and applications of orthopaedic medical devices; 4) Orthopaedic biomaterials; 5) Orthopaedic biomechanics; 6) Orthopaedic tissue engineering; 7)Cartilage regeneration; 8)Biotribology.

description.zh: 介紹工業觸媒在化學工業上所扮演的重要角色與有關吸附與催化之理論基礎，使學生瞭解工業觸媒的各種型態、物性、化性、鑑定方法、基本製造方法、性能評估及動力測試等內容在工業上實際應用例包括氫化、氧化、烷基化、裂解、重組、分餾、脫硫工程、汽車廢氣之控制以及藥物之合成。
description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的製程及功能，並探討材料的性質與材料組成原子的電子組態、原子間之化學鍵結、及晶體結構間的關係。本課程涵蓋了下列內容：1.原子的電子組態及原子間之化學鍵結，2.晶體結構，3.晶體缺陷與固體中的擴散，4.相圖與相變化，5.金屬材料及工程合金，6.陶瓷材料的結構、性質、製程與應用，7.高分子材料的結構、性質、應用與加工，8.複合材料，9.材料之機械性質，10.材料之電性質，11.材料之熱性質，12.材料之磁性質，13.材料之光學性質，14.材料的腐蝕與蛻化，15.半導體材料、生醫材料、先進材料、智慧型材料及奈米科技，16.材料與環境的相互影響，17.材料的選擇與設計考量。
description.en: This course introduces the fabrication and performance of various materials as well as the relationships that exist between the chemical bonding, structures and properties of materials.It covers the following topics: Atomic Structures and Interatomic Bonding; Structure of Crystalline Solids; Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids; Phase Diagrams and Phase Transformations; Applications and Processing of Metal and Alloys; Structures, Properties, Applications and Processing of Ceramics; Structures, Characteristics, Applications and Processing of Polymers; Composites; Mechanical Properties of Materials; Electrical Properties of Materials; Thermal Properties of Materials; Magnetic Properties of Materials; Optical Properties of Materials; Corrosion and Degradation of Materials; Semiconductors, Biomaterials, Advanced Materials, Smart Materials and Nanotechnology; Environmental Issues in Materials Science and Engineering; Materials Selection and Design Considerations.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 以學生相關領域，並與畢業論文相區隔的研究課題，讓學生進行書報討論與團體研習。透過最新文獻的選讀及研究報告的寫作，探討研究設計與分析方法：包括如何制定最佳化的實驗計畫及如何判定實驗數據的價值。
description.en: Study and discussion of recent research topics in the student's discipline but not on subjects close to the thesis. Discussion of more common and more difficult techniques in the optimal planning of experiments and critical analysis of experimental data through reports and literature surveys.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 分子生物學主要藉由分子的方法來探討細胞的生成、組成、功能及相互間之作用。因此此課程會含概以下四大部分：1.	細胞之簡介2.	分子基因學3.	細胞之內部組成4.	細胞間之生長，交互作用之影響
description.en: Molecular Biology is chiefly concentrated with eucaryotic cells and its title reflects the prime importance of the insights that have come from the molecular approach. This course will cover the following four different parts.1.	Introduction to the cell2.	Molecular genetics3.	Internal organization of the cell4.	Cells in their social context

description.zh: 基因體學工程學，是結合分子生物技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於分子生物技術的快速發展，DNA定序的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。基因體學工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
description.en: Genomic engineering is a newly developed field joining the knowledge from molecular biology and computational technology. Molecular biology techniques in high speed screening such as DNA sequencing have generated large amount of data.  From these data, new frontier in biomedical researches can be explored. Genomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology。

name.en: Operation and Maintenance of Water Plant

description.zh: 水處理廠操作與維護課程包括給水工程及污水工程設施之操作與維護,本課程為傳統衛生工程設施最主要之部份,內容涵蓋物理單元化學單元以及生物單元之操作維護,主要之設施包括前處理,混凝,沈澱,過濾,消毒,活性污泥,旋轉生物盤,接觸曝氣法以及污泥處理,處置單元之操作維護.
description.en: Water supply Engineering includes the system from water sources, intake, conveyor, purification and distribution. Water source will discuss about the intakes and resource conservation. Conveyor will have topics about layout, pumping and piping. Water treatment flow sheet is most important part in this course and the special treatment about odor problem is also studied.

description.zh: 隨著工業化的進展,土壤污染日益嚴重,由早期之鎘米事件,引起世人對於土壤污染之重視,本課程分別就土壤污染之定義,土壤污染之種類,土壤污染之來源,土壤污染之影響,土壤污染之危害介紹,以使受業者能有一全盤之了解.
description.en: The soil pollution in Taiwan are more and more serious by industrial development.From earlly Cd-rice event,people are focus to the soil pollution,This topic is going to edaling about the definition of soil pollution,the kinds of soil pollution,the sources of soil pollution,the effective of soil pollution,and the hazard of soil pollution.

description.zh: 給水系統的設計旨在充分供應計劃人口與計劃年限之計劃用水量，主要討論單元有：取水工程、輸水工程（動力管及壓力管之設計）、淨水工程（沈澱、混凝膠凝、過濾及消毒等）、配水工程（面積法、累積曲線法及經驗法等配水池設計方法、及各種配水管網之型式設計）等四大單元之設計，經由充份的習題演算，使學者熟悉給水系統設計方法。
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流
description.en: (A)Dynamics of a particles:(1)Kinematics of a particles:rectilinear coordinates, tangential and normal coordinates,polar coordinates.(2)Kinetics of a particles:force and acceleration, work and energy,impulse and momentum.(B)Dynamics of a rigid bodies (1)Kinematics of rigid bodies:translation and rotation,relative motion,instaneous zero velocity center.(2)Kinetics of rigid bodies:force and acceleration, work and energy, impulse and momentum.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 1.概論 2.建築載重及結構反應 3.空間整合與結構系統 4.建築常用之結構系統,含形態成用系統,向量作用系統,面作用系統及體積作用等5.垂直結構系統 6.水平結構系統 7.高樓結構系統 8.基礎結構系統 9.結構系統與建造
description.en: 1.Course introduction 2.Structural loading and structural behaviors 3.Space integration and structural system 4.Popular structural systems 5.Vertical structural system 6.Horizontal structural system 7.High rise building structural system 8.Foundation structual system 9.Structural system and construction

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

name.zh: 電腦在營建管理之應用
name.en: The Application of Computer in Construction Management

description.zh: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理(內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
description.en: The application of computer in construction managementThe basic knowledge in computer, the basic design thought and current system practical training in Chinese-English word process system , the functional explain and application in EXCEL, the basic concept in information management system , the basic concept in engineer information management system , the design of database and database software system's practice, simple application in statistics drafting software and other current computer's technology development and other application in construction management.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 以金屬材料之基本觀念為基礎，更進一步探討銅，鋁，鎂，鎳等合金之特性、用途及其熱處理，並以近年來頗受注目的高強度鋁合金之特性，從組織結構加以探討。課程內容有:1.高強度鋁及鋁合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。2.特殊及耐蝕銅及銅合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。3.錫，鉛，鋅及其合金之種類，特性、用途探討。4.耐蝕，高強度鎳及鎳合金之種類，特性、用途探討。5.高強度，耐氧化性鈦及鈦合金之種類，特性、用途之探討。6.高科技用貴金屬之種類，特性、用途之探討。
description.en: Using the basic concept of metal material as foundation to further discuss thecharacteristics, usage and heat treatment of the alloy of Cu, Al, Mg,Ni, it alsodiscusses the eye-catching high strength property of aluminum alloy at the recentyears, and study it from the viewpoint of tissue structure. The course contentincludes the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of highstrength aluminum and aluminum alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 2.The specification, usage and property of special copper, anti-corrosion copper andcopper alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 3.The specification, usage andproperty study of Sn, Pb, Zn and their alloy. 4.The specification, usage and propertystudy of anti-corrosion, high strength nickle and nickle alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property study of high strength, oxidation resistant titanium and titaniumalloy.6.The specification, usage and property study of high-tech noble metal.

description.zh: 介紹有機化學原理及應用於材料科學之場合
description.en: introduction to organic chemistry of materials

description.zh: 介紹電子陶瓷之原理及應用 訓練學生對電子陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: introduction to electronic ceramics In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications

description.zh: 由於工業發展帶來了各種環境的污染，使自然生態遭到破壞，人類健康受到傷害。本課程為分析汙染原因，並探討如何減輕污染源，以期學習者了解事前防範及事後補救之對策。
description.en: Introduction the methods of environmental protection.

description.zh: 本課程包括：1.陶瓷製程介紹，包括粉體製造、成形法、添加劑及燒結實務。2.材料基本概念，如陶瓷晶體結構、擴散、缺陷化學、固態反應等。3.結構陶瓷特性及檢測方法。4.電子陶瓷特性，包括介電性、鐵電性、半導性及檢測法。5.磁性材料特性及檢測。
description.en: The course includes: 1.Introduction of ceramics manufacturing : Including powder manufacturing , forming method, additive and sintering practice. 2.Material fundamental concept: Such as ceramic crystal structure, diffusion, defective chemistry. 3.Structural ceramic characteristics and detective method. 4.Electrical ceramic characters:including dielectricity,ferro-electricity,semi-conductivity, anddetective methods. 5.Magnetic material characteristics and detection.

description.zh: 內容包括概述、遙測原理、影像轉換與判斷、遙測設備原理及功能、遙測技術於探礦之應用等。
description.en: Introduction the theories of remote sensssing and its apply.

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭                                         解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義2.廢棄物分類                                         收集與清運3.焚化處理4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置6.特殊處理方法7.廢棄物處理                                         廠之規劃.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and                                         Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the                                         course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and                                         transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
description.en: Principles of machine design. Special design considerations in precision machinery. Static dynamic, and thermal analysis of structural members of machine. Analysis of sub-unit of machine like spindle unit, power drive unit, feed drive unit, and control system, etc. Accuracy and performance evaluation of machine, Case study with special emphasis on machine tool.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

description.en: Brief: This course covers different programming languages and technologies used to construct Web Based Systems, such as HTML, ASP, Connection to Database Systems, XML, JSP, etc. Some examples applied to industries are also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design. description.en: Basic Principle of Vision Inspection, Hardware Components of Vision System, Image Processing (Image Transform, Image Restoration, Image Enhancement, Image Segmentation), Non-Contact Dimension Measurement, Pattern Recognition (Automatic Edge Detection: Surface Area, Number of Holes, Perimeter, Centroid, Directional characteristic etc.) Image Compression and Transmission, and Case Study.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。基本熱傳理論、郎肯循環：蒸汽發生設備、渦輪機、冷凝器、泵及風扇、氣輪機及複合循環；核能原理、PWR、BWR、GCR、LMFBR；再生能源：地熱、太陽能、風力、海洋能源；能源之儲存；環境污染之防治。
description.en: Principles of Heat Transfer, Rankine Cycle: Steam Generators, Turbines Condensers, Pumps and Fans, Gas-Turbine and Combined Cycles, Principles of Nuclear Energy, Nuclear Power Plants: PWR, BWR, GCR, LMFBR, Renewable Energy Resources: Geothermal Energy, Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Energy from the Oceans, Energy Storage, Environmental Aspects of Power Generation.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位工廠。數位製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位製造概論、數位製造實例說明、商業模型分析、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站。
description.en: Brief: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。此課程對製造、設計、動力組甚為重要。內容有：流體靜壓、動壓及熱力學基本觀念、氣液壓傳動元件之靜、動態特性、氣液壓傳動元與機動間之關係、氣液壓傳動元與電腦控制、氣液壓技術實例。
description.en: Review of Fluid Static, Dynamics and Thermodynamics, Static and Dynamic Characteristics of Fluid Transmission Components and System, Computer-Control Fluid Power Systems, Case Study.

description.en: Introduction to laser machining device, laser cutting, laser welding, laser surface treatment and the safety items during laser machine operation.

Vector, list, deque, map, multimap, set, multiset, queues, priority queuesii.收藏類型之選擇策略(d) Generic演算法i.排序、搜尋、集合與數列演算、數值計算五、軟體開發緒論(a) 軟體流程(b) UML與繪圖工具(c) 整合開發環境(d) 測試與除錯(e) 設計與程式碼評審六、較大規模程式設計議題(a) Package與Namespace(b) 例外處理七、圖形介面程式設計(a) 事件處理與傳遞(b) 圖形介面設計原則(c) 圖形介面工具套件八、	軟體設計
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students essential knowledge and techniques of object-oriented methods. In particular, students will learn about the concepts, methods, and techniques for developing object-oriented software.

description.zh: 本課程以計算機硬體及軟體之基本介紹為始，逐步引入程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以Python及C語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入C++程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練及其在資訊工程上之應用，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計專業之基礎。
description.en: To familiarize the student with basic computer programming concepts. Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem statements, designing computer solutions, as well as an introduction into the syntax and semantics of the Python,C and C++ programming language. An important objective of the course is to present effective methods of program design using modular construction and structured programming notions of sequence, selection, and iteration structures.

description.en: This course investigates the principles, languages and environments, and elementary design methods for object-oriented programming.  Students will be required to complete a term programming project. Course contents: Class and object, message passing, inheritance, composition, virtual methods and polymorphism, templates,  object-oriented languages and environments, term project.

Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 本課程讓學習者熟悉電子商務之相關技術、議題、及應用，主要內容包括：電子商務的網路基礎建設，網路安全與防火牆，電子商務與全球資訊網，電子交易與電子付款系統，internet協定組，軟體代理人，行動計算基本原理，企業內網路及企業間網路，數位版權。
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the techniques, issues, and applications of electronic commerce. Course content includes the infrastructure of e-commerce, network security and firewall, e-commerce and WWW, e-trade and e-payment, internet protocols, software agent, principles of mobile computing, intranet and extranet, digital copyright.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 本課程探討處理空間資料的模式與演算法則，主題包含: (1) 空間資料庫介紹與應用, (2) 空間概念與資料模式, (3) 空間搜尋語言, (4) 空間資料儲存與索引, (5) 搜尋處理與最佳化, (6) 空間網路, (7) 空間資料庫的研究趨勢。
description.en: This course studies the models and algorithms for the efficient handling of data related to space. The topics include: (1) Introduction to Spatial Databases, (2) Spatial Concepts and Data Models, (3) Spatial Query Languages, (4) Spatial Storage and Indexing, (5) Query Processing and Optimization, (6) Spatial Networks, and (7) Trends on Spatial Databases.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹物件導向設計原則以及軟體設計樣式技術。課程涵蓋的內容包括：軟體設計與設計樣式重要基礎概念以及生成、結構、行為三類設計樣式。探討在系統需求與需求規格之後，藉由物件導向結構設計與適當的選擇以發展系統，並運用設計樣式重構軟體系統的邏輯結構，以改進軟體設計。透過使用UML和Java實際開發軟體系統，學習者將有充分機會練習設計樣式之使用。
description.en: This course discusses issues in principles of object-oriented design through design patterns, as listed below. Important general ideas on design and design patterns; creational, structural and behavioral design patterns. A study of the selection of appropriate object-oriented structure after the systems requirements or requirements specification of the software system has been developed. To improve design, design patterns are created in the logic view of a software system. Learners will follow the standard practice of using the UML approach and Java language to coding design patterns.

name.zh: 科技產業電力事故診斷與防治
name.en: Power Faults Diagnosis and Remedy for the High-Tech Industri

description.zh: 科技產業對電力供應的安全性,可靠性及電源品質的要求都極為嚴格,往往因一點點小事故引起巨大的災害而造成慘重的損失,電力事故已成為科技產業的重大風險之一,例如半導體工業,如何防範電力事故的發生及降低其風險機率是非常重要的課題,這些都有賴於良好的事故診斷技術及防治方法.本課程針對科技產業的供電電系統及設備常發生的事故及其原因進行診斷並提出改善方法, 範圍涵蓋科學園區主要的供電系統(特高壓地下環路供電系統)之線路及設備,以及科技廠家用戶內部供電系統及設備,內容包括常見事故型態介紹,事故原因理論分析及案例解說,以及事故的防治方法與可行措施.本課程旨在培育研究生建立電力事診斷的理論基楚,瞭解實務問題的面相,進而啟發思索改善對策,增進未來投入科技產業工作的能力,本課程的設計以研究所一學期為原則
description.en: This course is aimed to the power faults usually occurred in the high-tech industries, where the root causes of faults are diagnosed and the improved measures are proposed. The scope includes the power distribution systems and apparatuses of the utility and the customer plants in the science-based industrial parks, in which the fault types are described and the root causes of faults will be diagnosed based on theoretical analysis and practical cases investigations. Furthermore, the remedy methods and their related feasible measures will be discussed. The main contents of this course are:(1) Hidden risks and fault types descriptions(2) Harmonics problems on the very high voltage (VHV) underground distribution system with loop structure,      (3) Protection coordination problems on the VHV underground distribution system with loop structure,(4) Hazards due to ground fault transfer problems on the VHV underground distribution system with loop structure,(5) Damages due to sur

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 此課程介紹一般車輛及軌道車輛的通訊系統與行控裝置，在一般車輛部分，講授車輛故障檢測及車輛控制之通訊介面、自動收費系統、車輛管理系統，在軌道車輛方面，講授軌道車輛系統的號誌系統、通訊系統、自動收費系統、車輛行車控制、區間控制、安全裝置。
description.en: This course is to introduce the communication and transporting control for cars and railroad vehicles. For general cars, topics will be covered including OBD II and vehicle control system and protocols, electric tolling systems, and vehicle management system.  For railroad vehicles, this course will cover signaling system, communication system, fare collection system, train control, and block control.

description.zh: 1.基本車輛動態簡介 2.駕駛人模型 3.引擎／動力系統控制 4.恆速行駛控制 5.防滑驅動/防鎖死煞車控制 6.四輪轉向控制 7.主動式／半主動式懸吊 8.智慧交通系統 9.主動式安全系統 10.複合動力控制系統
description.en: To provide an overview of Vehicle Dynamics and Control Systems of intelligent vehicles in ITS.  Students will learn introduction to vehicle dynamics, driver modeling, driving simulation, engine/power-train control, cruise control, traction control/ABS, four-wheel steering, steer-by-wire, active/semi-active suspension, intelligent traffic systems, active safety technologies, and advanced power-train technologies.  Upon completion of this course, students should be able to follow the literature on these subjects and perform independent design, research and development work in this field.

description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

description.zh: 旨在探討系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。並輔以國內外績優服務企業之作業管理為案例討論。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems. The contents include an introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management. The case study on service management will be also included.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

name.zh: 電子與資訊產業實務專題
name.en: Practical Topics on Electronic and Information Industry

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是讓學生學習資訊電子產業相關知識與技術，授課方式以邀請資訊電子產業資訊經理人員講授該產業之相關主題為主，輔以學校任課老師講解相關理論，將是一門理論與實務並重之課程。課程內容包括資訊電子產業特性、資訊電子產業上中下游介紹、資訊電子產業製商整合環境介紹、資訊電子產業供應鏈管理專題、資訊電子產業企業資源規劃專題、資訊電子產業顧客關係管理專題、資訊電子產業現場監控專題與資訊電子產業協同商務專題。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach students the concepts and technologies about electronic and information industry. In this course, several speakers with practical experiences will be invited to give presentations about Integration of Manufacturing and Commerce (IM&C) in electronic and information industry. The lecture of this course will also provide some theoretical algorithm about some specific topics. The contents of this course will include supply chain management, enterprise resource planning, customer relationship management, shop floor control and collaborative production commerce.

description.zh: 課程包含非線性系統之簡介與非線性控制器之設計，並培養學生能運用非線性控制理論設計非線性系統及車輛系統之控制器，內容包括非線性控制之簡介，相平面分析，里阿撲諾理論與高等穩定度分析，回饋線性化方法，滑動模式控制法等。
description.en: Introductions of nonlinear systems and nonlinear controllers design are described in this course. Students will learn how to design the nonlinear controller for physical nonlinear systems or vehicle dynamic systems. This course includes the following topics: phase-plane analysis, fundamental of Lyapunov theory, advanced stability theory, feedback linearization, and sliding mode control.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.
